head.title: Stand Out Or Else Stand Back

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Fashion, Beauty and Fitness

hedline.hl1: Stand Out Or Else Stand Back

abstract.p: Photos of people sporting colorful summer outfits on streets of New York (On the Street column) (M)

block.p: Personal style stands tall in a summer drowning in a deluge of bland-looking megabrands. Individuality has nothing to do with age and everything to do with flair: right, a bespoke suit made from 1930's-style necktie silk; left, classic equestrian patterns and a shoulder bag in the shape of a riding saddle; bottom far right, a study in gray, black and white, and dolman sleeves; top far right, a suit jacket shaped with a sash, and a towering straw hat secured with red ribbon, worn by a free spirit in an age of conformity.

Personal style stands tall in a summer drowning in a deluge of bland-looking megabrands. Individuality has nothing to do with age and everything to do with flair: right, a bespoke suit made from 1930's-style necktie silk; left, classic equestrian patterns and a shoulder bag in the shape of a riding saddle; bottom far right, a study in gray, black and white, and dolman sleeves; top far right, a suit jacket shaped with a sash, and a towering straw hat secured with red ribbon, worn by a free spirit in an age of conformity.
